  1. """
  2. Views for the ``django-frequently`` application.
  4. """
  5. from math import fsum
  7. from django.contrib import messages
  8. from django.contrib.auth.models import User
  9. from django.core.urlresolvers import reverse
  10. from django.http import HttpResponse, HttpResponseNotFound
  11. from django.template.response import TemplateResponse
  12. from django.utils import timezone
  13. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  14. from django.views.generic import CreateView, DetailView, ListView
  16. from django_libs.views_mixins import AccessMixin
  18. from .forms import EntryForm
  19. from .models import Entry, EntryCategory, Feedback
  22. class EntryMixin(object):
  23. """
  24. Mixin to handle and arrange the entry list.
  26. """
  28. def get_ordered_entries(self, queryset=False):
  29. """
  30. Custom ordering. First we get the average views and rating for
  31. the categories's entries. Second we created a rank by multiplying
  32. both. Last, we sort categories by this rank from top to bottom.
  34. Example:
  35. - Cat_1
  36. - Entry_1 (500 Views, Rating 2)
  37. - Entry_2 (200 Views, Rating -4)
  38. - Entry_3 (100 Views, Rating 3)
  39. - Cat_2
  40. - Entry_1 (200 Views, Rating 7)
  41. - Entry_2 (50 Views, Rating 2)
  43. Result:
  44. Cat_1 has a rank by: 88.88 (avg. views: 266.66, avg. rating: 0.33)
  45. Cat_2 has a rank by: 562.5 (avg. views: 125, avg. rating: 4.5)
  47. Cat_2 will be displayed at the top. The algorithm is quality-oriented,
  48. as you can see.
  50. """
  51. if queryset:
  52. self.queryset = queryset
  53. else:
  54. self.queryset = EntryCategory.objects.all()
  55. if self.queryset:
  56. for category in self.queryset:
  57. entries = category.get_entries()
  58. if entries:
  59. amount_list = [e.amount_of_views for e in entries]
  60. rating_list = [e.rating() for e in entries]
  61. views_per_entry = fsum(amount_list) / len(amount_list)
  62. rating_per_entry = fsum(rating_list) / len(rating_list)
  63. category.last_rank = views_per_entry * rating_per_entry
  64. category.save()
  65. else:
  66. self.queryset = self.queryset.exclude(pk=category.pk)
  67. self.queryset = sorted(self.queryset, key=lambda c: c.last_rank,
  68. reverse=True)
  69. return self.queryset
  71. def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  72. if "get_answer" in request.POST.keys():
  73. entry = Entry.objects.get(pk=request.POST['get_answer'])
  74. entry.last_view_date = timezone.now()
  75. entry.amount_of_views += 1
  76. entry.save()
  77. return TemplateResponse(
  78. request,
  79. 'frequently/partials/answer.html',
  80. {
  81. 'entry': entry,
  82. 'rated_entries': self.request.session.get(
  83. 'rated_entries', False),
  84. },
  85. )
  86. self.feedback = Feedback()
  87. if "user_id" in request.POST.keys():
  88. try:
  89. user_id = int(request.POST.get('user_id'))
  90. try:
  91. self.feedback.user = User.objects.get(pk=user_id)
  92. except User.DoesNotExist:
  93. pass
  94. except ValueError:
  95. pass
  96. if 'rating_id' in request.POST.keys() and request.is_ajax():
  97. try:
  98. entry_id = int(request.POST.get('rating_id').replace(
  99. 'rating_id', ''))
  100. try:
  101. entry = Entry.objects.get(pk=entry_id)
  102. return HttpResponse(entry.rating())
  103. except Entry.DoesNotExist:
  104. return HttpResponseNotFound()
  105. except ValueError:
  106. return HttpResponseNotFound()
  107. for key in request.POST.keys():
  108. if key.startswith('up') or key.startswith('down'):
  109. try:
  110. entry_id = int(key.replace('up', '').replace('down', ''))
  111. try:
  112. entry = Entry.objects.get(pk=entry_id)
  113. except Entry.DoesNotExist:
  114. return HttpResponseNotFound()
  115. except ValueError:
  116. return HttpResponseNotFound()
  117. if not request.session.get('rated_entries', False):
  118. request.session['rated_entries'] = []
  119. if entry.pk not in request.session['rated_entries']:
  120. request.session['rated_entries'].append(entry.pk)
  121. request.session.modified = True
  122. self.feedback.entry = entry
  123. if key.startswith('up'):
  124. entry.upvotes += 1
  125. self.feedback.validation = "P"
  126. if key.startswith('down'):
  127. entry.downvotes += 1
  128. self.feedback.validation = "N"
  129. entry.save()
  130. self.feedback.save()
  131. if request.is_ajax():
  132. return TemplateResponse(
  133. request,
  134. 'frequently/partials/feedback_form.html',
  135. {
  136. 'feedback_entry': entry.pk,
  137. 'feedback': self.feedback,
  138. },
  139. )
  140. elif key.startswith('feedback'):
  141. try:
  142. feedback_id = int(key.replace('feedback', ''))
  143. try:
  144. self.feedback = Feedback.objects.get(pk=feedback_id)
  145. except Feedback.DoesNotExist:
  146. return HttpResponseNotFound()
  147. except ValueError:
  148. return HttpResponseNotFound()
  149. self.feedback.remark = request.POST.get("remark")
  150. self.feedback.save()
  151. if request.is_ajax():
  152. return TemplateResponse(
  153. request,
  154. 'frequently/partials/feedback_form.html',
  155. {'feedback_send': True},
  156. )
  157. return self.get(self, request, *args, **kwargs)
  160. class EntryCategoryListView(AccessMixin, EntryMixin, ListView):
  161. """
  162. Main view to display all categories and their entries.
  164. """
  165. model = EntryCategory
  166. template_name = "frequently/entry_list.html"
  167. access_mixin_setting_name = 'FREQUENTLY_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS'
  169. def get_queryset(self):
  170. """
  171. Customized to get the ordered categories and entries from the Mixin.
  173. """
  174. self.queryset = super(EntryCategoryListView, self).get_queryset()
  175. return self.get_ordered_entries(self.queryset)
  178. class EntryDetailView(AccessMixin, EntryMixin, DetailView):
  179. """
  180. Main view to display one entry.
  182. """
  183. model = Entry
  184. template_name = "frequently/entry_list.html"
  185. access_mixin_setting_name = 'FREQUENTLY_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS'
  187. def get_object(self, **kwargs):
  188. obj = super(EntryDetailView, self).get_object(**kwargs)
  189. obj.last_view_date = timezone.now()
  190. obj.amount_of_views += 1
  191. obj.save()
  192. return obj
  194. def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
  195. context = super(EntryDetailView, self).get_context_data(**kwargs)
  196. context.update({
  197. 'rated_entries': self.request.session.get('rated_entries', False),
  198. 'object_list': self.get_ordered_entries(),
  199. })
  200. for key in self.request.POST.keys():
  201. if key.startswith('down') or key.startswith('up'):
  202. context.update({
  203. 'feedback_entry': int(
  204. key.replace('up', '').replace('down', '')),
  205. 'feedback': self.feedback,
  206. })
  207. return context
  208. return context
  211. class EntryCreateView(AccessMixin, CreateView):
  212. """
  213. Feedback submission form view.
  215. """
  216. model = Entry
  217. form_class = EntryForm
  218. access_mixin_setting_name = 'FREQUENTLY_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS'
  220. def form_valid(self, form):
  221. messages.add_message(self.request, messages.SUCCESS, _(
  222. 'Your question has been posted. Our team will review it as soon'
  223. ' as possible and get back to you with an answer.'))
  224. return super(EntryCreateView, self).form_valid(form)
  226. def get_form_kwargs(self):
  227. kwargs = super(EntryCreateView, self).get_form_kwargs()
  228. if self.request.user.is_authenticated():
  229. kwargs.update({
  230. 'owner': self.request.user,
  231. })
  232. return kwargs
  234. def get_success_url(self):
  235. return reverse('frequently_list')
